product_details.name: Mood Enhancing Chocolate For Men & Women
product_details.description:
NOOKY
WHAT IT HELPS IN

Lifts your Mood up

Boosts your Blood Flow

Enhances Connection

Increases Pleasure

HOW TO USE NOOKY

ENJOY TOGETHER
Inside you will find two pieces, one for him and one for her.

TIMING MATTERS
Eat 30 minutes before activity

SET THE MOOD
Relax, play with your partner's sensitive spots.

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and modern layout divided into geometric quadrants over a dark and deep maroon-toned background enhanced with golden grid lines and circles, creating a sophisticated yet vibrant feel. At the top-left, a bold large heading (id: "heading") stands out in a golden hue. Below it, a serif-style subheading (id: "subheading") communicates the product focus. Centrally placed is a smiling female model holding the product (id: "product_image"), bringing human warmth to the promotion.

To the bottom-left, a bulleted list (id: "description") outlines the benefits in clean white text. Below that is the price element (id: "price") presented prominently in golden text. Beneath the price, a rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") contains a contrasting black-colored text (id: "cta") for high visibility. To the bottom-right, a handwritten-style tagline (id: "tagline") adds a personalized, friendly tone.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon: `#66001a`
- Dark Brown-Black: `#1a0505`
- Gold: `#e1cf8d`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Black (CTA text): `#000000`
product_color: The product image features a warm and inviting color palette that blends deep, rich tones with subtle highlights to create a luxurious and elegant aesthetic. The prominent colors include chocolate brown (#4B2E2A) from the product packaging, complemented by golden accents (#D4AF37) that add a premium touch. The model's deep burgundy dress (#8B1E3F) harmonizes with the brown tones, while her flowing dark brown hair (#3A2A25) enhances the richness of the palette. Soft skin tones (#F3C8B3) provide contrast and add warmth. A banner designed around these hues can communicate indulgence, sophistication, and appeal, ideal for promoting a high-end chocolate product.
